casebody.data:
Joseph MAUER, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Lori J. GIDLEY, James Schiebner, Department of Corrections, and Kathy Warner, Defendants-Appellees,
and
Michigan Corrections Organization SEIU Local 526M, Defendant. Joseph Mauer, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Department of Corrections, James Schiebner, Lori J. Gidley, and Kathy Warner, Defendants-Appellees,
and
Civil Service Commission, Defendant. SC: 156780, SC: 156781
COA: 333230, COA: 333874 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 17, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
